title: What's new in version 1.7.4
text:
More bug fixes reported by you!
* Fixing some issues with zeroed hashrates for lock-screen widgets
* Fixing a bug in 2Miners BTG balance always being at 100%
* Fixing a Herominers issue with Beam stats not being shown
* Fixing an issue with Herominers ETHW stats not showing up
Thank you! New pools coming soon!

title: What's new in version 1.7.2
text:
Big update incoming!
* NEW supported pool: Nanopool!
* Improving the calculator's reliability and simplifying its usage
* Fixing an issue that made Herominer's Neoxa reward estimations too big
* Fixing an issue with Conflux stats in WoolyPooly
* Adding WoolyPooly Solo to the supported pools
* Improving the appearance of the circular lock screen widgets when there are offline workers
* Fixing many bugs reported by the users
* Interface improvements

title: Please, rate this app!
text: If you're feeling generous with your time, please support me by leaving a nice review in the App Store. As an independent developer, it means the world to me. Thank you!

title: What's new in version 1.7.1
text:
* Adding Ethereum PoW (ETHW) and Cortex (CTXC) support for Herominers, 2Miners and WoolyPooly
* Fixing an issue with RVN support for Hiveon Pool
* Defaulting to reported hashrate for lock screen widgets
* Fixing and issue with ETC in Herominers not displaying the stats
* Fixing an issue with some miners in 2Miners not displaying the reported hashrate when it was available

title: New app made by me: S2 Crypto!
text:
S2 Crypto was just released by me! Now you can check your favorite crypto prices on your Lock Screen!
This app requires iOS 16.

externalUrl.title: Check it out in the App Store

title: Ethereum mining has ended
text: The Merge has finally happened, therefore Ethereum mining is over. It has been a fun ride! Time to move on to another coins. Support PoW!

title: What's new in version 1.7.0
text:
Very big update incoming!
* Lock Screen Widgets for your top mining rigs! (iOS 16 required)
* Neoxa support for Minerpool, 2Miners and Herominers
 * Ravencoin support for Hiveon Pool
* Fixing an issue with Herominer's Flux reward estimation being too big
* Improving 2Miners reward estimations

Thanks for everyone that sent a bug report or a feature request! I'm working on all of your requests!
